title: A Heaven Hill Christmas
description: The Heaven Hill Christmas Boxset brings nine different novella's in one volume.1. Liam & Denise2. Tyler & Meredith3. Jagger & Bianca4. Layne & Jessica5. Steele & Christine6. Rooster & Roni7. Drew & Charity8. Mandy & Dalton9. Tatum & .......Each novella will be around 15K-25K in length, and the last one sets up the spin-off series featuring the children of Heaven Hill members!
author: Laramie Briscoe
